Files | Data Structures | Macros | Typedefs | Functions
L4 Firewall Driver API

Files

file  fwlibl4.h
 This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of L4FW. This also contains some related macros.

#define L4FW_MAX_PROT_GROUPS   (8U)
 Maximum number of Port groups for L4 Firewall.
 
#define L4FW_MAX_PORTS   (3U)
 Maximum number of Port for L4 Firewall.

Detailed Description

Function Documentation

int32_t FWLIBL4ClearAndGetAllError ( l4fwAllApErrors_t *  l4fwAllErr)

This function clears and gets L4FW Error status for all instances.

Parameters
l4fwAllErrpointer to structure to write the error status value.
Returns
STW_SOK on success
int32_t FWLIBL4GetInstSummary ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
l4fwInstSummary_t *  instSum 
)

This function gets instance summary for a L4FW instance.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of L4 Firewall instance.
instSumPointer to structure to fill the instance summary.
Returns
STW_SOK on success
int32_t FWLIBL4SetProtGroupMembers ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  groupNum,
uint32_t  connIdVal 
)

This function sets connId values for a protection group.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of L4 Firewall instance.
groupNumProtection group Number
connIdValBitfields corresponding to connId values to enable the firewall access for the group
Returns
STW_SOK on success
int32_t FWLIBL4SetRegionProtGroupId ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  regionNum,
uint32_t  groupNum 
)

This function sets protection group for a region.

Parameters
baseAddrBase address of L4 Firewall instance.
regionNumregion Number of the Firewall
groupNumProtection group Number to be assigned
Returns
STW_SOK on success
